answers.answer: On my second child that was every other day for me. Did you sleep on your hand and that side of your face
Both hands and my eyes are even swollen i always sleep the same way on my right side with a pillow between my legs and one under my head
I'm sure that's a sign of pre eclampsia I'd call a doctor to be on the safe side
Yeah I agree. It was from me sleeping on a certain side but never that serious I would get checked out to make sure baby and you are fine.
Thank u ladies ive never had this happen
Thats a definite sign of preeclampsia! Go get checked immediately!
You might consider going to er to be safe. But yes does sound like pre eclampsia.

question: I just woke up and my face and hands are swollen what should i do this is my 6th child and never had this before i have an appointment on wed
title: worried
